pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:5.1: Ime kho panāyyāyo sattarasa saṃghādisesā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako bhikkhunisaṃghassa udositaṃ datvā kālaṅkato hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.4: eko assaddho appasanno, eko saddho pasanno.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.6: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno taṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.8: Evaṃ vutte, so saddho pasanno taṃ assaddhaṃ appasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.11: Dutiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.13: Atha kho so saddho pasanno taṃ assaddhaṃ appasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.16: Tatiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.22: Atha kho so udosito tehi bhājīyamāno tassa assaddhassa appasannassa pāpuṇāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:6.23: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:7.1: Evaṃ vutte thullanandā bhikkhunī taṃ purisaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:7.2: “māyyo, evaṃ avaca, tumhākaṃ pitunā bhikkhunisaṃghassa dinno”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:7.6: Evaṃ vutte, thullanandā bhikkhunī te mahāmatte etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:7.7: “api nāyyā tumhehi diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā sakkhiṃ ṭhapayitvā dānaṃ diyyamānan”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:7.9: “saccaṃ kho ayyā āhā”ti taṃ udositaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghassa akaṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:7.10: Atha kho so puriso parājito ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:7.15: Atha kho so puriso daṇḍito bhikkhunupassayassa avidūre ājīvakaseyyaṃ kārāpetvā ājīvake uyyojesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:8.4: “paṭhamaṃ bhikkhuniyo udositaṃ acchindāpesuṃ, dutiyaṃ daṇḍāpesuṃ, tatiyaṃ bandhāpesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:9.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:9.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:9.5: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:9.6: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:9.9: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā viharissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:9.10: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:9.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:10.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā dāsena vā kammakārena vā antamaso samaṇaparibbājakenāpi, ayaṃ bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:11.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:17.2: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca sikkhamānañca sāmaṇerañca sāmaṇeriñca ṭhapetvā yo koci paribbājakasamāpanno.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:18.1: Aḍḍaṃ karissāmīti dutiyaṃ vā pariyesati gacchati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:21.2: saṃghova tassā āpattiyā mānattaṃ deti mūlāya paṭikassati abbheti, na sambahulā na ekā bhikkhunī. Tena vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:21.4: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenapi vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
